verses.1: Tua ciangin Naamah gam mi Zofar in dawng a,
verses.2: “Job aw, ka heh nong suaksak a, ka ki-ip zo nawn kei hi.
verses.3: Na thugente khempeuh kei nong simmawhna kampau vive hi a, ahi zongin kong dawnna ding ka thei hi.
verses.4: Tanglai pek a kipan, leitung mi a om cil a kipanin,
verses.5: migiloteʼ nopsak hun a tom mahmahna thu, Pasian a don loteʼ lungdam hun a tom mahmahna thu thei lo na hi hiam?
verses.6: Migilo pa lian mahmah in vantung a ban to zongin, lian mahmah in a lutang in meii lak a ban to zongin,
verses.7: leivui them bangin maimang veve lel ding hi. Amah a thei ngei mite in, ‘Amah koi ah om ta ahi hiam?’ ci-in lamdang sa ding uh hi.
verses.8: Amah pen zan a mangmat bang, mumaang bangin maimang dinga, cikmah hunin kimukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.9: Ama teenna ngei mun panin amah maimang dinga,
verses.10: mizawngteʼ na a suhsakte, a tate in lohsak ding uh hi.
verses.11: A pumpi moi suahin a thatang a hat mahmah hangin a sawt loin leivui a suak pak ding ahi hi.
verses.12: “Ama kam sungah gitlohna lim sa mahmah in, namtui mahmah sa-in, a leii tawh lop melmel a,
verses.13: amah in muammuam nuamin sia khia nuam lo a, lim sa mahmah in a dangtawng denna-in a neih hangin,
verses.14: a gil sung a tun ciangin a kha mahmah an suakin, gu a kha mahmahte zahin kha deidai hi.
verses.15: Migilo pa in a guk sa nate lua khiakik a, a gil sung nangawn panin Pasian in a lak khiatsak hi.
verses.16: Migilo paʼ nekte pen gu tawh kibang a, gul guneiteʼ tuk bangin amah a sisak hi.
verses.17: Amah in bawngnawi le khuaizu gun tui bangin a luang mu kha lo ding hi.
verses.18: Amah in a nasep thamante nusia dinga, a hauhna khempeuh zang kha man lo ding hi.
verses.19: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mizawngte bawlsia-in don lo a, midangteʼ inn lam sate sutin a tang hi.
verses.20: “A huaihamna bei ngei lo a, a duh khempeuh siit nei lo hi.
verses.21: Amah in a nek ciangin a khamval cih omngei lo a, tu-in a hauhna khempeuh a bei mang khinta ahi hi.
verses.22: A cihtheih pen hun laitakin lungkhamna lian pen a tuak hi.
verses.23: Amah in a duhduh ne mai hen! Pasian in hehna tawh amah gim pia ngawn ding hi.
verses.24: Amah in namsau pelhin a taina ah sumngo thal in kap tuk ding hi.
verses.25: Thaltang khat in ama pumpi paih let a, a te-dildel thaltang muk ah si taak keuhkeuh a, ama tungah a kihtakhuai hong tung hi.
verses.26: A khol sa khempeuh kisusia a, mihingʼ tawh loh meikuang in amah le a innkuan khempeuh a kaang tum hi.
verses.27: Vantungte in hih mipaʼ mawhna pholak uh a, leitung in ama langah teci a pang hi.
verses.28: Pasianʼ hehna hangin ama hauhna khempeuh a kisusia mang ding ahi hi.
verses.29: “Migiloteʼ ngah dingin Pasian in a piak gimna migiloteʼ ngah pen tu-a bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
